actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 511(d) of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 (21 U.S.C. 881 (d)) to raise the monetary unit applicable to drug-related judicial forfeitures from $2,500 to $10,000.

summary.text: Increases the monetary limit applicable to drug-related judicial forfeitures from $2,500 to $10,000 pursuant to the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 511(d) of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 (21 U.S.C. 881 (d)) to raise the monetary unit applicable to drug-related judicial forfeitures from $2,500 to $10,000.
